Generation VI.X: Although it possesses a violent temperament, it won't put up with bullying. It uses the leaf in its mouth to sense the movements of its enemies.
Generation VI.Y: It charges ahead and bashes its opponents like a berserker, uncaring about any hits it might take. Its arms are mighty enough to snap a telephone pole.
Generation VI.Omega Ruby: Although it possesses a violent temperament, it won't put up with bullying. It uses the leaf in its mouth to sense the movements of its enemies.
Generation VI.Alpha Sapphire: It charges ahead and bashes its opponents like a berserker, uncaring about any hits it might take. Its arms are mighty enough to snap a telephone pole.

Generation VII.Sun: It boasts superb physical strength. Those who wish to become Pangoro's Trainer have no choice but to converse with their fists.
Generation VII.Moon: From the slight twitches of its bamboo leaf, it deduces its opponent's movements. It's eager to tussle but kindhearted toward its companions.
Generation VII.Ultra Sun: This rowdy Pokémon boasts great physical strength. Many Trainers are also smitten by its lively character.
Generation VII.Ultra Moon: Pangoro is the type to talk with its fists. It doesn't say much as it pummels opponents with enough force to send a dump truck flying.

Generation VIII.Sword: This Pokémon is quick to anger, and it has no problem using its prodigious strength to get its way. It lives for duels against Obstagoon .
Generation VIII.Shield: Using its leaf, Pangoro can predict the moves of its opponents. It strikes with punches that can turn a dump truck into scrap with just one hit.
